div.p: Financial support was provided by the Midi‐Pyrénées and Aquitaine regions (project BIOLIS no. 20101204005MP) and French Ministry of Ecology and Sustainable Development (project BILISSE GIP Ecofor). We thank Yohan Charbonnier and Philippe Caniot for participating in bird data collection in Aquitaine and Midi‐Pyrénées regions, Samantha Bailey for site selection in Centre region, Jérôme Willm for logistical help, Fabrice Sin (ONF) and Amélie Castro (CRPF) for their help in site selection for the Aquitaine region, as well as the different forest owners and farmers for their permission to access their land.
